library(countdown)
library(xaringan)
library(xaringanExtra)
library(knitr)

hook_source <- knitr::knit_hooks$get('source')
knitr::knit_hooks$set(source = function(x, options) {
  x <- stringr::str_replace(x, "^[[:blank:]]?([^*].+?)[[:blank:]]*#<<[[:blank:]]*$", "*\\1")
  hook_source(x, options)
})
